edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.cs56_games_maze

Class MazeComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.cs56_games_maze.MazeComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener

    public class MazeComponent
extends javax.swing.JComponent
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener
    A class extending JComponent that is used to draw all of the information held in a MazeGrid (the markers, as well as the remaining closed walls of each cell)
    Version:
    5/14/13 for proj1, cs56, S13
    Author:
    Jake Staahl, Evan West
    See Also:
    MazeGrid, Serialized Form

      • MazeComponent

        public MazeComponent(MazeGrid grid,
                     int cellWidth,
                     int inputColor,
                     boolean r)
        Construct a MazeComponent to draw this MazeGrid grid, with the width of each Cell being drawn at cellWidth pixels wide and tall
        Parameters:
        grid - the MazeGrid this MazeComponent will be drawing
        cellWidth - the width and height to draw each Cell
